Package de.ikor.sip.foundation.security.authentication.common.extractors

Class TokenExtractors

java.lang.Object
de.ikor.sip.foundation.security.authentication.common.extractors.TokenExtractors
@ConditionalOnSIPSecurityAuthenticationEnabled @Component public class TokenExtractors extends Object
Spring component providing a map of all token extractors and the related authentication providers.
Author:
thomas.stieglmaier

  • Constructor Details

    • TokenExtractors

      public TokenExtractors()

  • Method Details

    • addMapping

      public void addMapping(Class<?> providerClassName, SIPTokenExtractor<?> tokenExtraction)
      Adds a mapping to the token extractors. This is usually called in a PostConstruct block of SIPAuthenticationProvider implementations.
      Parameters:
      providerClassName - the class of the provider adding the token extractor
      tokenExtraction - the tokenextractor itself

    • extractTokenFor

      public org.springframework.security.core.Authentication extractTokenFor(Class<?> authProvider, jakarta.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request)
      Extracts the token for a given auth provider and request.
      Parameters:
      authProvider - the auth provider for which the token should be extracted
      request - the request from which the token should be extracted
      Returns:
      the extracted token
